title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Competencies: Concept-Based Program for Improving Foundational Arithmetic Fluency

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can solve 20 single-digit subtraction problems with ≥85% accuracy within 15 minutes.
Learners can correctly explain ≥12 out of 15 problems within 10 seconds using the "subtraction-to-addition conversion" strategy.
Learners can accurately calculate ≥8 out of 10 two-digit operations within 30 seconds using the "computation with base-10" strategy.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
